name: MAP Editor Game - Prototype
description:
This is a small prototype of game "map editor game". This is a learning project.

The idea is to create a creative game where you can chill to build your city or anything you want. The economy system is basic and simple (unfinished). 

The idea is to make a game from a map editor for all the lovers of map editing with extra features like economy, leveling, unlocking stuff...

Don't hesitate to suggest or comment here :) 

Controls :

- mouse right button :  removing

- mouse left button : placing

- mouse middle button (scroll) : changing tile

Ideas : 

  1. Gameplay

- Leveling system : Tiles unlocking, "Money" earning...

- Economy based on tiles synergy

   2. Art

- Removing the existing tiles and adding various tiles of any type. (Citys, Volcanos...)

- Tile Editor and Tile importer for unlimited creation

   3. Other

- Rework of the tile selection system with filters and research tab

- Main menu and intro menu

- Map selection menu with difficulties and various parameters

- Rework of the game scene

PS : Prototype inspired from Godot Engine template called "Random Tilemap Generator" made by portella0.
